title: Satru Mun Kidaitha Song Lyrics Sinthamal Sitharamal
stanzas: <div>Satru Mun Kidaitha Thagaval Padi Song Lyrics Sinthamal Sitharamal

Satru mun kidaitha
thagaval padi
tholaindhu ponathu
en idhayamadi
uyire en uyire en uyire uyire(2)

uttru paarkum vidham
purinthathadi
ilamai siragadithu
paranthadhadi
uyire en uyire en uyire uyire

maaligaiyaai malar maaligaiyaai
un manadhinai alangarippen
devi undhan kangalil
naan thinasari avatharippen

theeviramaai thinam theeviramai
un thaedalai anumadhippen
theendum nernthidum
un thavarugal anusarippen

mudhal naal enai theettinaai
marunaal uyir poottinaai
sanga tamizh pola un manam
sangamikkum podhu santhanam

Yaathiraigal en yaathiraigal
un vizhigalil nigazhgirathe
aasai kaetkum kelvigal
ada nanbagal kulirgirathe

raathirigal en raathirigal
miga ragasiyam aagirathe
naalum pookkum niyabagam
ada vanmurai pesiyathe

vanga kadal eeram pogumaa
indha pudhir kaadhal aagumaa
imai moodaamal
irai thaedaamal
un uravaal uyirthiruppen.

Satru mun kidaitha
thagaval padi
tholaindhu ponathu
en idhayamadi
uyire en uyire en uyire uyire

uttru paarkum vidham
purinthathadi
ilamai siragadithu
paranthadhadi
uyire en uyire en uyire uyire
